sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT tt_balance.id AS table_id, tt_balance.pay_ref_id, tt_balance.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.remarks, tt_balance.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_rt.user_number AS recharge_number, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.tr_mode, tt_rt.tr_type, tt_rt.tr_id, tt_rt.operator_ref, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.dtcommamt, tt_rt.dtchargeamt, tt_rt.mdtcommamt, tt_rt.mdtchargeamt, m_op.operator_name, m_op.image, m_service.service_name, m_user.created_by AS parent_id, parent_id.user_fname AS parent_fname, parent_id.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, m_user.user_fname, m_user.user_mobile, tt_balance.netamt, tt_rt.api_response_id, tt_rt.api_logs AS api_name, tt_balance.status
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_rt.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate}} */ AND tt_rt.status = :P3 /* {{$_GET.selectstatus}} */ AND tt_balance.user_id = :P4 /* {{identity}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC

SELECT tt_balance.id AS table_id, tt_balance.pay_ref_id, tt_balance.user_id AS ac_holder_user_id, tt_balance.old_balance, tt_balance.amount, tt_balance.new_balance, tt_balance.transaction_type, tt_balance.tr_date, tt_balance.crdr_type, tt_balance.remarks, tt_balance.created_by AS transaction_by, tt_rt.user_number AS recharge_number, tt_rt.comm_amt, tt_rt.charge_amt, tt_rt.tr_mode, tt_rt.tr_type, tt_rt.tr_id, tt_rt.operator_ref, tt_rt.api_ref, tt_rt.dtcommamt, tt_rt.dtchargeamt, tt_rt.mdtcommamt, tt_rt.mdtchargeamt, m_op.operator_name, m_op.image, m_service.service_name, m_user.created_by AS parent_id, parent_id.user_fname AS parent_fname, parent_id.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, m_user.user_fname, m_user.user_mobile, tt_balance.netamt, tt_rt.api_response_id, tt_rt.api_logs AS api_name, tt_balance.status
FROM tt_balance
INNER JOIN tt_recharge_trans AS tt_rt ON (tt_rt.id = tt_balance.pay_ref_id) INNER JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_rt.op_id AND m_op.service_id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_service AS m_service ON (m_service.id = tt_rt.service_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS m_user ON (m_user.id = tt_balance.user_id) INNER JOIN m_users AS parent_id ON (parent_id.id = m_user.created_by)
WHERE tt_balance.user_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */
ORDER BY tt_balance.pay_ref_id DESC
